text: Aur jo nikah ka mauqa na paayein unhein chahiye ke iffat-maabi (continence/paak daamani) ikhtiyar karein, yahan tak ke Allah apne fazal se unko gani karde aur tumhare mamlukon mein (in your possession) se jo makatibat(emancipation) ki darkhwast karein unse makatibat karlo, agar tumhein maloom ho ke unke andar bhalayi hai, aur unko us maal mein se do jo Allah ne tumhein diya hai. Aur apni laundiyon (slave-girls ) ko apne duniyavi faiydon ki khatir qahba-gari (prostitution) par majboor na karo jabke woh khud paak daaman rehna chahti hon. Aur jo koi unko majboor karey to is jabr ke baad Allah unke liye gafoor o raheem hai
